Name: treatment of waste paperboard, unsorted, sorting | waste paperboard, sorted | EN15804GD, U
Category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/383:Materials recovery/3830:Materials recovery
Description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/10471/documentation

This activity represents the treatment of 1 kg waste paperboard (cardboard) from separate collection, i.e. a source-segregated municipal solid waste fraction, through sorting for recycling. The activity starts with receiving the unsorted waste paperboard, as collected from the households, at the sorting facility and ends when sorted fractions are produced. 

The activity starts with "waste paperboard, unsorted" being available to the sorting facility.

The activity ends with "waste paperboard, unsorted" being sorted and "waste paperboard, sorted" available for transportation at the gate of the sorting facility.
